subtitles:
43537 46816 People once believed
that when someone dies...

46896 51016 a crow carries their soul
to the land of the dead.

51096 54295 But sometimes,
something so bad happens...

54375 59415 that a terrible sadness is carried
with it and the soul can't rest.

59495 62414 Then sometimes,
just sometimes...

62494 67294 the crow can bring that soul back
to put the wrong things right.
111088 114927 There's a piece of glass.

119327 123646 Shelly Webster and Eric Draven.
Wedding was tomorrow night.

123726 126846 Who the fuck gets married
on Halloween anyhow?

130285 134085 - Sir, we gotta move her.
- Do it.

134165 136324 All right, guys,
let's do it.

136404 139484 Devil's fucking Night.
What's the count so far?

140924 143643 - They're slacking off from last year.
- Three hours to go.

143723 148403 - Maybe they're just slow starters.
- Coming through!

151242 154442 You guys can't come in here
and take her away like this.

154522 159121 There are procedures. You should have
cleared this with me first.

159201 161401 - Is this the victim?
- No, it's Amelia Earhart.

161441 164201 - We found her, and you missed it.
- I don't care what her name is.

164281 166760 I didn't give the order to move her.
Jesus, Albrecht.

166840 170160 I can see why they took away
your gold shield.

170240 173119 Yeah, I wasn't a big enough asshole.
Come on. Let's go.
173199 175039 All right, clear out.

176359 178839 - Shelly?
- Stand back, kid.

180998 185038 - Where's Eric?
- Just don't worry about him.

185118 187238 Tell him to take care
of Sarah.

187318 191077 Look, I will.
You just, uh, lie back. Come on.

200676 203395 - You Sarah?
- Yeah.

203475 207355 Yeah, look. Your sister,
she's gonna be okay.

207395 210554 She's not my sister.
Shelly just takes care of me.
210594 212834 She's my friend.
212914 216674 Her and Eric.
216714 218873 You lied to her about Eric.

220553 224113 And you're lying
to me about Shelly.

224193 226432 She's gonna die,
isn't she?

235111 240590 Now, come on.
Come on. It's okay.
240710 243990 She's gonna be fine.

262108 265987 A building gets torch ed.
All that is left is ashes.

266067 268827 I used to think that was true
about everything...
268907 273146 families, friends, feelings.

273186 276986 But now I know that sometimes,
if love proves real...

277026 281225 two people who are meant to be together,
nothing can keep them apart.

317900 320980 What are you,
like the night watchman?

341417 344656 You know, what this place
needs is a...
344736 346976 good natural catastrophe.

347056 351296 - Earthquake, tornado, you know.
- No, no, no, no.

351336 354215 Mickey, come on, man. You got to put
the mustard underneath first.
354295 356495 Maybe a flood like in the Bible.
356575 359494 Hey, hey, let me do it.

359574 363454 There we go. All right.
How about some onions?

363494 365854 Come on, man.
Don't cheap out on me.

365894 367773 - Lots of onions.
- All right, here you go.
367813 370133 Hey, all right.
370213 372493 Now we're talking.
372573 377092 Hey, it's the Sarah monster.

377172 380852 - How do you steer that on a wet street?
- Pure talent. Hi.

380932 384691 Now, Sarah, she's a genuine hot dogger.
You hungry?

384771 386491 - You buying?
- I'm buying.

386571 390090 - No onions though, okay?
- No onions?
390170 393250 They make you fart big time.

399329 401929 You know, Lake Erie
actually caught on fire once...

402009 404528 from all the crap
floating around in it.
405648 409248 I wish I could have seen that.
467080 471400 Fire it up! Yeah!

508914 512674 - All right, we busted their machines!
- Shit!

534711 537951 Oh, oh, shit, guys.
T-bird, cop car, cop car.

544910 547389 Bad people out
on the street tonight.

553189 555028 - Damn it!
- What was that?

555108 557668 - You wait right here.
- Be careful.
557748 560908 Mickey, call it in for me!

650975 653935 - Eric?
- Department of Housing!

654015 658334 Code violations?
Safety hazards?
658414 660534 Place looks fine to me.
660574 663294 Let's redecorate.
665693 669693 "Abash, the devil stood...

669733 672333 and felt how awful
goodness is.

672413 676812 Saw virtue in her shape, how lovely."
It's pornography.
689410 692050 No, no, no, me first.

737884 740683 - Hey, that's good.
- That's good.

744403 747842 See if you can top that, man.
Can you top that?

747922 749762 Look at that.
Look at that.

751042 755321 Here's to Devil's Night,
my new favorite holiday.

758841 760761 You go over there
and talk to your pals--
760801 763800 You sick fuck.

763840 767400 Are you out of
your motherfucking mind, man?
770519 774719 Look at that!
776839 778798 Pussies drink last, man.

779998 782318 - Fuck you, Tin Tin.
- Hey.

783678 786077 Shit ain't
even loaded, man.
786157 788237 This one is.

788317 791117 Which of you Motor City
motherfuckers...

791197 795316 wants to bet me
this one isn't?

795396 799116 Hey, fire it up!
Fire it up!

799196 802155 - Fire it up!
- Fire it up!
- Fire it up!
802235 804915 Fire it up! Fire it up!
804995 807954 Here's your shooters.

808034 809914 - Put your guns away, huh, guys?
- How ya doing?

843870 847229 - I love you.
- Say that again.
852668 855948 Restaurant.

860427 863467 - Wow, you look great.
- Ta-da!

870226 872706 - Come here!
- No, no, no!

908461 911581 * "Just paint your face"
The shadows smile *
912780 916100 * Slipping me away from you *
917580 920979 * It doesn't matter how you hide *
921059 924259 * We find you if we're wanting to *

926539 930218 * So slide back down
and close your eyes *

930258 934298 * Sleep a while
you must be tired *
934378 937457 * But every night I burn *
937537 941657 * Screaming the animal scream *
943856 946136 * Every night I burn *
946216 950215 * Dreaming the crow-black dream *
955175 959214 * Dreaming the crow-black dream **

966813 969253 Couple more rings.
That's 24k.

969333 973172 24k, huh? It's 18k.
It's crap. It's probably fake.
973252 975492 Leather purse. Leather.
975572 979891 Geez. Oh, what is this, Tin Tin?

979971 984331 A blood stain
that's on here?

984411 986930 I'll give you 50 bucks.
And I hate charities.

987010 989730 Now, you,
take it or leave it.
989810 992450 Right there for ya.
992530 996729 Decisions, decisions.
998209 1001249 You cheap ass, chrome dome...

1001329 1004208 ...child molesting,
saprophyte motherfucker.

1004248 1006528 Close the gate
when you go out!

1006608 1009168 Oh, I close this up
for you real good, massa.

1011727 1015007 Yeah, sit on it and twirl,
you dirty scum.

1019526 1023806 Lucky I didn't stab
your fat ass.
1039363 1043763 * Someone take these dreams away *
1043843 1048442 * That point me to another day *
1048482 1053002 * Peculiar personalities *
1053082 1057041 * The stretch of true realities *
1060001 1063920 * They keep calling me *
1064000 1067680 * They keep calling me *
1068800 1071799 * Keep on calling me *
1074039 1077078 * They keep calling me **

1124552 1127552 What the fuck you all painted
up for, crackhead, huh?
1130031 1134111 Halloween ain't till manana.
1174385 1177665 Fuck, you murderer!

1177745 1180265 I ain't murdered nobody, man!
I don't even fucking know you!

1180345 1184264 - Man, what the fuck you want, man?
- I want you to tell me a story.

1184344 1187624 A man and a woman
in a loft a year ago.

1187664 1190143 - You're out of your fucking mind--
- Listen!

1190223 1194863 I'm sure you'll remember.
You killed them... on Halloween.

1194943 1199702 Yeah, yeah, Halloween, yeah.
Some dude, some bitch, whatever, man.
1199742 1202102 Her name was Shelly.

1202182 1205061 You cut her.
You raped her.

1205141 1210701 Shelly, yeah, yeah. I shanked
her pink ass and she loved it!

1219539 1224259 Murderer? Murderer? Let me tell you
about murder. It's fun!

1224339 1228778 It's easy.
You gonna learn all about it.

1233297 1235737 I'd like you to meet
two buddies of mine.
1235817 1238377 We never miss.

1248535 1250535 - Try again!
- Aaah!

1255415 1260054 Victims.
Aren't we all?
1270573 1276212 * Sometimes it rains inside my head *
1276252 1280531 * When the words run dry *
1280611 1283731 * The walls are breathing *

1283771 1287930 - Look at this mess!
What's the world coming to?
- It's a mess.
1292890 1294929 * No, they don't have to take you *

1295009 1297649 I got to go upstairs.
Report from the front.

1297729 1302128 * No, they don't have
to take you away *

1302208 1305368 Get out of my way,
you worms!

1306448 1308287 Give me some of that
over there!

1310447 1314007 Why don't you ladies come by later?
Check me out.

1314047 1318646 Hey, guess what?
Arcade Games fell down, went boom.

1318686 1322366 - Boom.
- Can you imagine that? It's tragic.

1322446 1326485 Gather your soldiers.
You're on for tomorrow night. No sweat.

1326525 1330444 - Is the man in?
- He's taking a meeting.

1359241 1362880 You're thinking
about the past.
1365080 1367480 Dad gave me this.
1367560 1371559 Fifth birthday.

1371639 1376118 He said childhood's over
the moment you know you're gonna die.
1389437 1391796 Is she asleep?
1397755 1399915 I think we broke her.
1403755 1405794 I love her eyes.

1412354 1418233 * No, they don't have
to take you away **

1424592 1427631 Hey, kid,
get the hell outta the road!
1430551 1435030 * I don't hate them *
1435110 1438350 * But I know them *
1438430 1442829 * I don't want them hanging 'round *
1442909 1445389 * I won't roll my bones **
1445469 1450788 I told you to stay out of here.

1450828 1454348 So I guess you're not gonna be home
till a lot later, huh, Darla?

1454428 1458307 She's busy. Go play with your dolls
or something, okay?
1458347 1460587 I don't have any dolls.
1460667 1463907 Get some food, huh?

1463947 1466826 Somebody already bought me dinner.
The police.

1472305 1475825 - "Somebody already bought me dinner.
The police."
1485424 1488543 Thirty, forty dollars.
1490223 1492583 Who the fuck is this now?

1492623 1496622 Hey! Piss off!
We're closed!

1499342 1503021 Sleep it off somewhere else, dusthead,
unless you want to get mutilated.

1510300 1514380 Goddamn creatures of the night,
they never learn.

1521739 1525938 "Suddenly I heard
a tapping, as if someone...

1525978 1529778 gently rapping,
rapping at my chamber door."
1531658 1533857 What are you talking about?
1533937 1536537 You heard me rapping, right?

1536617 1540576 You're trespassing,
and you owe me a fucking new door!

1542896 1545736 I'm looking for something
in an engagement ring.

1547215 1549455 You're looking for a coroner,
shit-for-brains.

1553535 1558454 Oh, shit.
Oh, shit on me!

1558534 1560974 Shit on me.
Shit on me!
1569093 1571252 You're not paying attention.

1576212 1581291 I repeat, a gold
engagement ring, yes?

1582851 1586170 It was pawned here a year ago
by a customer of yours named Tin Tin.

1588770 1592289 He confided in me
before he ran out of breath.
1597369 1599288 Who's this sack of shit?

1599368 1602208 That's Tin Tin, one of
T-bird's little helpers.

1602288 1605208 I think you can rule out
accidental death.

1605288 1607967 Don't any of your street demons
have real grown-up names?

1608047 1612047 This could be a turf hit, but it doesn't
look like your usual gang crap.

1612127 1616646 Come on, Albrecht, spare me.
You're a beat cop now, so be a beat cop.

1616726 1618566 I'm suppose to thank you
for that, right?
1618646 1622245 Watch your fucking mouth.

1623405 1625725 What the hell
do you call that?
1626725 1629204 I call it blood, detective.

1629284 1632924 I suppose you'll write it up
as graffiti.

1632964 1635644 You can leave
my crime scene now, okay?

1642083 1644882 - Warmer?
- What are you doing?

1644962 1647482 - Don't you know this game?
- What game?

1647522 1650322 Okay, the rings!
I'll tell you about the rings!

1650402 1654601 They're in that metal box!
It's under the shelf there!

1654681 1659960 Take the fucking rings!
Choke on them, you son of a bitch!

1663400 1665880 - Look, it goes to the attic.
- Okay.

1682077 1686117 Oh, it's beautiful.
I don't believe it.

1709034 1711833 - You have one chance to live.
- Take anything you want.

1711913 1714873 - Thank you.
- Take anything!

1714953 1717673 Now you're going to tell me
where to find...

1717753 1720272 the rest of Tin Tin's
little party pals.

1720352 1722632 The Pit. They all
hang out at The Pit.

1722712 1727591 T-birds's little potato-heads hang out
there. Funboy lives there upstairs.

1727671 1730551 - Funboy.
- Oh, baby, oh.

1730631 1734230 - A whole jolly club...
- Please!

1734310 1736950 - with jolly pirate nicknames!
- Stop! Please!

1737030 1739590 - Jesus Christ in a taxicab!
- Hold still!
1741189 1744429 Each one of these is a life...
1744509 1746909 a life you helped destroy.

1746989 1749508 I'm begging you.
Don't kill me.
1749548 1753108 I'm not gonna kill you.

1753188 1757187 Your job will be to tell the rest
of them that death is coming for them...

1765466 1769506 Tell them Eric Draven
sends his regards.

1771305 1775225 You walk outta here,
they're gonna erase your sorry ass.

1775305 1778784 You're nothing but street grease,
you motherfucker!
1778864 1780904 Is that gasoline I smell?

1802221 1805541 It's on the house, kiddo,
you know that.
1805621 1807821 One root beer.
1809740 1812380 I can't do anything.

1812460 1816739 Your mom... technically,
she's off right now.

1823259 1827978 Police! Don't move!
I said, "Don't move!"

1828018 1830937 I thought the police
always said, "Freeze!"

1831017 1834777 I am the police and I say don't move,
Snow White. You move, you're dead.
1834857 1839816 And I say I'm dead and I move.

1839856 1843056 Not one more step.
I'm serious.

1843096 1847295 Then shoot, if you will,
Officer Albrecht.

1847375 1850375 What are you, nuts?
Walking into a gun?

1852175 1855214 - You don't remember me?
- What are you talking about?

1855294 1859134 How about Shelly?
Do you remember Shelly Webster?
1859214 1861773 Shelly Webster's dead, my friend.

1861813 1866253 I want you to move over to the curb,
nice and easy. Move it!

1866293 1870932 Okay, we're gonna
wait here for backup.

1871012 1875292 - It's getting too weird for me.
- Oh, it gets better.
1875372 1877691 Do you know someone named T-bird?

1877771 1882171 He had a friend who shouldn't have
played with knives. Like the coat?

1882251 1884730 You're the guy
that murdered Tin Tin.

1884810 1888170 - Check it out.
- He was already dead.

1888250 1893369 He died a year ago.
The moment he touched her.

1893449 1896969 They're all dead.
They just don't know it yet.
1897049 1899368 Get away from there!

1899448 1902448 Cops!
Get outta here!
1910927 1915086 Oh, great, great.

1915166 1917646 Guy shows up looking like
a mime from hell...

1917726 1919926 and you lose him
right out in the open.

1920006 1925605 Well, at least he didn't do that walking
against the wind shit. I hate that.

1925685 1929444 Little early
for Devil's Night.
1930964 1933564 You are very restless.

1933644 1936723 Just wish I was a little
hungry again, that's all.

1936803 1940883 - Be careful of what you ask for.
- Yeah, I may get it, I know.

1951881 1954801 There are energies
aligning against you.

1954881 1957241 Seeing is believing,
isn't it?

1975598 1979398 Gideon's pawnshop just burned down
to the foundation.

1979478 1982557 Nobody cleared
this little event with me.

1982637 1984317 I didn't have nothing
to do with that.

1984397 1986957 You must be
awfully disappointed.

1987037 1990236 I got trouble.
One of my crew got himself perished.

1990276 1992476 - Yeah, who might that be?
- Tin Tin.

1992556 1996955 Somebody stuck his blades in all his
major organs in alphabetical order.

1996995 1999475 Gentlemen, by all means,
I think we ought to have...

1999555 2002594 an introspective moment of silence
for poor, old Tin Tin.

2005154 2007634 You're working for me
tomorrow night, right?

2007714 2010393 - Whatever you say, I can do.
- Good.
2010433 2013153 That's very reassuring.

2013193 2017073 I still ain't heard
why Gideon's burned down.

2017153 2021432 Is that a natural catastrophe
or act of God or something?
2021512 2023272 Call it my need to know.
2055507 2057987 Let go, you creep!

2062946 2066106 You didn't even slow down,
you dickhead!
2067466 2069745 He couldn't have stopped.

2069825 2073945 He was a buttface.
I could have made it.

2074025 2076945 What are you supposed to be,
a clown or something?

2080904 2085463 It's more like surfing than skating.
I wish the rain would stop, just once.

2086583 2089943 - It can't rain all the time.
- Eric?

2106181 2110580 Don't thank me.
Are we fighting the good fight?

2110660 2114819 Double homicide a year ago.
No convictions.
2114899 2118179 Annie... look at that.

2118259 2122298 "We, the undersigned tenants of
1929 Caulderon Court Apartments--"
2122378 2124338 What is this, a petition?

2124418 2127178 Big "kick me" sign for a very nice girl
who found herself a cause.

2127258 2131177 - The cause got her killed.
- She was fighting tenant eviction
in that neighborhood?

2131257 2136897 Shelly Webster and her nice
rock-and-roll boyfriend, Eric Draven.

2136976 2140376 The last time you snooped around a case
is when you got put back on the beat.

2140456 2144296 - I know. Torres keeps reminding me.
- I bet he does.

2151015 2154614 You're going to wind up
working a school crosswalk.

2156774 2161333 You didn't get that file from me, okay?
And don't tell me you owe me one.
2161373 2163773 Ah, I owe you one!

2192329 2196049 Tomorrow night
we can get high...

2196129 2199648 and watch this whole fucking city
burn from that window.
2209007 2212926 * In the motherfucking dark *
2217326 2220365 * I don't want to believe *

2223525 2226045 - There's a big fucking bird over there.
- * No more **
2231964 2234483 Come here, bird.

2234563 2236563 Hey, bird.
Hey, bird.
2236643 2238883 Bird. B-B-Birdie.
2238923 2241443 Here, birdie, birdie.

2241483 2244362 Come here, birdie,
birdie, birdie.
2246882 2249961 Birdie? Hey, birdie?
2254761 2256640 What the fuck?

2262760 2267119 No, man! Don't do that! You nearly
gave me a fucking heart attack!
2269319 2272078 Don't sweat it.

2273718 2276638 It's time for you to take
your bird and leave, freako.

2284237 2288876 Take your shot, Funboy.
You got me dead bang.

2290796 2295515 You are seriously fucked up.
Did you look in the mirror?
2295595 2298955 You need professional help.
2303234 2305754 He shoots! He scores!

2315473 2319032 - Jesus Christ!
- Jesus Christ?
2319112 2321712 Stop me if you heard this one.

2321792 2324591 Jesus Christ
walks into a hotel.

2329791 2332430 He hands the innkeeper
three nails and he asks...
2332510 2335910 Don't you ever fucking die?
2335990 2338150 "Can you put me up for the night?"

2343429 2347828 - Does that hurt?
- Fuck. Does it-- Fuck, does it hurt?

2349948 2353867 Look what you've done
to my sheets.

2377104 2379024 I've got a gun
in my pocket.

2381944 2384543 You're happy to see me,
aren't you?

2401581 2405301 Stay away!
Stay away from me!

2416539 2420858 Mother is the name for God
on the lips and hearts of all children.

2420938 2425498 Do you understand?
Morphine is bad for you.

2435497 2440096 Your daughter is out there
on the streets waiting for you.

2468652 2472172 If I wanted ice,
I would have asked for ice!
2472252 2474411 Now fill it up!
2475451 2478691 Fill it up yourself, macho man.
2478771 2481330 I really need this.

2489569 2493369 You burn yourself
playing with matches?

2493409 2495888 - Fuck off.
- You have an appointment.

2495968 2498328 - Well, shit on me.
- Drink up.

2498408 2501208 This is a first.
Do I bow or do I curtsy?

2501288 2503967 Get my friend here
a glass of blood.
2507407 2510207 Hey, good night, Darla.
2512526 2516086 You stay put right there.
2523805 2527124 Get away, steamhead.

2557000 2562520 As you can see, I'm
on the corner of 27th and Washington...

2562560 2565199 the site of last year's biggest
Devil's Night conflagration.

2565279 2568119 It was exactly one year ago
that the building you see...

2568199 2571038 across the street from me
was totally demolished by fire.

2571078 2573158 The fire that was fought
by seven fire companies...

2573238 2575278 but lost the lives
of two fire fighters.

2575358 2579917 In fact, if it weren't for the constant
surveillance by the local police--
2582877 2586236 Jesus. Don't ever do that, man.
2590076 2592156 Good likeness.

2592236 2595795 I saw your body, man.
You died. You got buried.
2595875 2598035 You still have your hat on.
2601794 2603794 I gotta sit down.
2613233 2617352 are you some kind of... ghost?

2626591 2630950 I don't know what I am. I need you
to tell me what happened to us.

2632870 2636790 You took a six-story swan dive
out of a window.
2636870 2639829 She, ah, was beaten and raped.

2639909 2644309 Died at the hospital.
Hey, you asked, man.
2644389 2646908 Come on. Read the file.

2646988 2651148 Shelly Webster held on
for 30 hours in intensive care.
2651228 2654307 Her body finally just gave it up.

2654347 2658067 I saw it.
I couldn't do jack for her.

2667545 2669385 - Hey.
- Don't touch me!

2681584 2684743 I saw her
through your eyes.

2684823 2686823 You stayed with her
the whole time.

2686903 2692142 Yeah, well, you got to
understand something, all right?

2692222 2696782 I was hoping
she'd come out of it, you know.

2696822 2699661 Give me something
I could work with.

2704301 2706700 Why didn't you do
something about it?

2706780 2709980 You think any people in that building,
even the ones who signed the petition...

2710060 2713379 would talk after
what happened to you?

2713459 2716539 I kept asking
questions and...

2716619 2719179 finally got busted for sticking
my nose where it wasn't wanted.
2723018 2724898 This your wife?

2724978 2729257 Yeah, we, uh-- Well, not anymore,
we're getting a divorce.

2733937 2737776 Little things used to mean
so much to Shelly.

2737856 2741216 I used to think
they were kind of trivial.

2741296 2744175 Believe me,
nothing is trivial.

2753414 2757693 You shouldn't smoke these.
They'll kill you.

2762173 2765252 You going to vanish
into thin air again?

2768732 2771332 I thought I'd use
your front door.

2774251 2779850 Look, man, I'm sorry as hell for what
happened to you and your girlfriend.

2790489 2793849 I got stabbed!
I shot the son of a bitch!

2793929 2796928 I watched the bullet hole
close by itself.

2797008 2799928 And then my business
gets blown up real good.

2800008 2803127 - Other than that, my day sucked.
- Yeah.

2803167 2805607 I saw him too.
He had a guitar.

2805687 2809926 He winked at me before he jumped out
a fourth-floor window like he had wings.

2810006 2814806 He winked at ya?
Musicians.

2814886 2817245 - What else did you see?
- So far I haven't heard...

2817325 2819725 shit about what you're going to do
about all this crap!

2819805 2825084 What do I get? My livelihood
got flushed and went swirling.
2825164 2827804 You ain't lost everything.

2827884 2832763 Yeah, and maybe you're not
such a big shot either! Ow! Jesus!
2832843 2836283 Fair enough. Catch.

2839762 2842082 Say hello to the last fellow
who wouldn't cooperate with me.

2842162 2844082 What're you telling me,
this thing is real?

2844122 2847641 All the power in the world
resides in the eyes, fella.
